entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with drizzle this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
